response.overview: After a botched robbery leaves their partner dead, two criminals, Cindy and Lola, are forced to flee with bags of cash and a lifeless body in their trunk. While Cindy mourns the loss of her lover, Lola remains fixated on survival and the next move. As the night unfolds, tensions rise, secrets unravel, and betrayals surface. When it’s time to bury James, their true intentions are revealed—and only one thing is for certain: only one of them will be left standing.
response.title: Grounded
